title: How covid-19 has changed the way of teaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: COVID-19 and Indian Education Ecosystem Indian government has closed down all schools and colleges temporarily as a measure to contain the spread of the novel coronavirus. It is uncertain as to when these schools will re-open and millions of students are experiencing a watershed moment. With no cure for the pandemic, there would be a huge impact on the continuity of learning for more than -285 million young school going children in India. Traditional learning, teaching and assessment methodologies of a school are affected by COVID-19. COVID-19 pandemic tragically illustrates the need to build schools with advanced technology and digital competency while adopting digital teaching and learning in a digital world. The pandemic has transformed traditional learning and teaching modules into e-learning. This disruption in Indian education system is making policymakers to think twice while adoption of e-learning solutions in government schools. Digitalization of all schools is necessary to manage the crisis and build a resilient Indian education system in the long term. Read more at - How COVID-19 will impact Indian Educational System?
